mapper.select: SELECT b_id as bId, b_title as bTitle, b_content as bContent, b_writer as bWriter, b_datetime as bDateTime, b_disabled as bDisabled, b_views as bViews FROM lc_board WHERE b_id IS NOT NULL AND b_disabled=0;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lc_board( b_id, b_title, b_content, b_writer, b_datetime, u_id, b_disabled ) VALUES( #{bId}, #{bTitle}, #{bContent}, #{bWriter}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{uId}, #{bDisabled} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE b_id= #{bId}, b_title= #{bTitle}, b_content= #{bContent}, b_writer= #{bWriter}, b_datetime= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), u_id= #{uId}, b_disabled= #{bDisabled} ;
mapper.select: SELECT b_id as bId, b_title as bTitle, b_content as bContent, b_writer as bWriter, b_datetime as bDateTime, u_id as uId, b_disabled as bDisabled FROM lc_board WHERE b_id = #{bId};
